resources.string: To properly work in some versions of Android, Patago must require authorizations. This is part of the Android system, it will ask you and explain each one. Please authorize the requests and we can continue with Patago.
If you don\'t have an account,\nor wants to create a different user\ntouch here.

Oh no!
Patago needs your permissions to go.
Whithout that the app will not work.
Thanks anyway.

Patago is an application originally created as an academic work. Its purpose is to help people with attention problems to perform tasks by breaking routines into minimal units, witch can be comfortably done. This is one of the approaches to deal with symptoms of conditions such as Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD), Chronic Procrastination, Anxiety, and Obsessive Compulsive Disorder. It can also simply help you accomplish tasks. =)

 Author: Alexandre CMC Souza
 Discipline: Android Application Development
 Under the guidance of Professor Heider Pinheiros Lopes
 FIAP
 Course: MBA IN DEVELOPMENT OF APPLICATIONS AND GAMES FOR MOBILE DEVICES - INTERNET OF THINGS
Here you can place a call to your trusted friend.

Remember, the trusted friend could or could not be available by the time.\n Search for a nice quiet area, take a breath and prepare to explain your situtation.\n To make your call, just push the button bellow.
